content.rendered:
About Dr. Priya Diwaker

Dr. Priya Diwaker, completed her MBBS from government medical college, Bilaspur and her post graduation in Dermatology from JJM Medical College, Davangere. Thereafter she acquired training in Lasers and Aesthetic Dermatology from Indore for a year. 

She also obtained fellowship in Lasers and Dermatosurgery from Mahidol University, Bangkok. She has been one of the youngest speakers in various conferences. Along with Clinical Dermatology, she has a keen interest in Aesthetic Dermatology and Trichology.

  • Location: Raipur, Chhattisgarh
  • Qualifications: MBBS, DDVL
  • Specialties: Dermatology, Trichology, Aesthetics, Lasers
  • Experience: 12+ Years

BOOK AN APPOINTMENT

Health Talks by Dr. Priya

Experience

  • IADVL Fellow – Lasers and Aesthetics, Lukhnow
  • Fellowship in Aesthetics and Lasers, Indore
  • Fellowship in Lasers and Dermatosurgery, Thailand
  • Associate Editor, Dermoscopy Text and Atlas
  • Assistant Editor, Trichoscopy Text and Atlas
  • Editorial board member, International Journal of Dermoscopy
  • Publications in both National and International journals
  • Ex- consultant, Rita Skin Foundation, Kolkata
  • Ex- consultant Apollo hospital and Medica Superspeciality Hospitals , Kolkata
  • Medical director and consultant at Medigenix – Advanced Gastroenterology and Dermatology centre, Raipur
